results.title: That Obscure object of desire = Cet obscur objet du desir
results.creator_credit: Luis Bunuel, Serge Silberman and Greenwich Film Production
results.brief_description: Mathieu (Fernando Rey) is a self-satisfied Spanish businessman whose ordered, elegant life begins to fall apart when he becomes obsessed with the virginal Conchita, who professes love for him, but refuses to have sex with him. Based on a novel by Pierre Louys, “La Femme et le Pantin”, Bunuel’s film version is a comic exploration of the libidinous energies that undermine the precarious safety and order of the bourgeoisie. Though an assured and elegant film, Bunuel utilises surrealist touches, such as having two actresses play the same lead role (Carole Bouquet and Angela Molina) to unsettle and provoke the viewer.
results.title_for_label: That Obscure object of desire = Cet obscur objet du desir

results.title: That eye, the sky
results.creator_credit: John Ruane, Grainne Marmion, Peter Beilby, Working Title Films and Entertainment Media
results.brief_description: When twelve year old Ort Flack’s father Sam is plunged into a coma after a truck accident, his family is fractured. As Ort’s mother bravely tries to hold her family together, a mysterious stranger appears and changes their lives - giving Ort courage, comfort and faith. This acclaimed adaption of the novel by Tim Winton is about the healing power of love, about fantasy and faith, about a boy’s visions of the world beyond and about the blurry distinctions between the natural and the supernatural. Nominated for 9 AFI Awards and starring Peter Coyote, Lisa Harrow and Jamie Croft. Co-starring Amanda Douge, Mark Fairall and Alethea McGrath.

results.title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
results.creator_credit: Steve Barron, Jeffrey Sneller, Raju Patel, Dieter Gessler Filmproduktions, Davis Film and Video Production and Allied Pinocchio Prod
results.brief_description: This classic Italian story about Gepetto the carpenter who makes a wooden boy which he can love as a son. This production has wonderful computer animated special effects as the wooden “boy” becomes flesh. For those who loved the award winning Disney production, this version of the age-old story will delight all the family. Starring Martin Landau and Jonathan Taylor Thomas.

results.title: That's entertainment
results.brief_description: For over 50 years MGM produced an array of dazzling stars and musical spectaculars. “That’s Entertainment” is a compilation of snippets and sequences from nearly 100 musicals, featuring great moments with most of the studio’s major singing and dancing stars, including Judy Garland, Fred Astaire, Eleanor Powell, Gene Kelly and many more.

results.title: The Adventures of Blinky Bill
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description: Blinky Bill is one of the most loved characters in Australian children’s literature. He and his friends get up to many adventures in the bush in this popular animated series.

group_works.title: Detective Blinky; Blink Bill's wedding picnic.
group_works.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films

results.title: Detective Blinky; Blink Bill's wedding picnic.
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross and Yoram Gross Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Adventures of Blinky Bill”.
Two adventures with Australia’s most lovable Koala. “Detective Blinky”: Someone is stealing the berries from the town’s only Mulgaberry bush. Detective Blinky is on the case with Splodge to catch the culprit. “Blinky Bill’s wedding picnic”: Blinky’s mother and Nutsy’s father are getting married and a big celebration is planned. At the wedding picnic, everyone has a good time and the Dingos finally learn to live in harmony with everyone.

results.title: The Adventures of Milo and Otis (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Masanori Hata, Satoru Ogata, Masaru Kakutani, Columbia Pictures and Fuji Television Network
results.brief_description: Join a curious kitten named Milo and his inseparable buddy, a pug-nosed pup named Otis, as they fall, frolic, glide and tumble through one exciting escapade after another. Narrated by Dudley Moore. Based on an original story by Masanori Hata.

results.title: The Adventures of Marco Polo
results.creator_credit: Archie Mayo, Samuel Goldwyn and Samuel Goldwyn Productions
results.brief_description: Gary Cooper stars as 13th Century explorer and adventurer Marco Polo, the Venetian who opened the trade route from Europe to China. At the court of the great Kublai Khan, ruler of the Mongol Empire, Marco battles the intrigue of the court to win the admiration of the great Khan and the love of a beautiful Princess (Sigrid Guthrie). A classic historical drama filled with spectacular battle scenes, panoramas, opulent sets and costumes. Co-starring Basil Rathbone.
